ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] RE: [EQ-Necromancers] Expansion Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: So far we have Plaque and EB, plus some other spells. NO pet spells added yet but this is just test and I believe they are messing around with new spells irght
ygData.messageBody:
So far we have Plaque and EB, plus some other spells. NO pet spells added
yet but this is just test and I believe they are messing around with new
spells irght now.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: John Sanders <john.sanders@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, March 02, 2000 9:57 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] RE: [EQ-Necromancers] Expansion Spells


>From: "John Sanders" <john.sanders@...>
>
>Does anybody have the list of Necro expansion spells?
>
>Also, I'd love to see the differing types, it would be nice to have a
random
>one per cast. Also, different effects per pet would be nice.
>
>Zarbon, who thinks everything would be nice.
>
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Jason Brown <jasonb@...>
>To: 'EQ_Necromancer' <eq_necromancer@onelist.com>
>Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2000 8:46 AM
>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] RE: [EQ-Necromancers] Expansion Spells

level --
>they

from

>>
